application.atds.discharge

Interface DischargeService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DischargeServiceImpl

    public interface DischargeService
    Service interface for managing discharge-related operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<DischargeEO> allPatientCheckouts()
      Retrieves a list of all checked-out patient details.
      java.util.List<DischargeEO> allPatientDischarges()
      Retrieves a list of all discharged patient details.
      java.util.List<DischargeEO> cashDischarge()
      Retrieves a list of discharged patients who paid by cash.
      void dischargePatient(DischargeEO dischargeObj)
      Discharges a patient with the provided discharge details.
      void sendEmail(java.lang.String to, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String text)
      Sends an email to the specified recipient with the provided subject and text.

    • Method Detail

      • dischargePatient

        void dischargePatient(DischargeEO dischargeObj)
        Discharges a patient with the provided discharge details.
        Parameters:
        dischargeObj - The DischargeEO object representing the discharge details.

      • allPatientDischarges

        java.util.List<DischargeEO> allPatientDischarges()
        Retrieves a list of all discharged patient details.
        Returns:
        A list of DischargeEO objects representing the discharged patients.

      • allPatientCheckouts

        java.util.List<DischargeEO> allPatientCheckouts()
        Retrieves a list of all checked-out patient details.
        Returns:
        A list of DischargeEO objects representing the checked-out patients.

      • cashDischarge

        java.util.List<DischargeEO> cashDischarge()
        Retrieves a list of discharged patients who paid by cash.
        Returns:
        A list of DischargeEO objects representing cash-discharged patients.

      • sendEmail

        void sendEmail(java.lang.String to,
               java.lang.String subject,
               java.lang.String text)
        Sends an email to the specified recipient with the provided subject and text.
        Parameters:
        to - The email recipient.
        subject - The email subject.
        text - The email text.
